EmailTemplate.subject: Deploying VDI {{lead.first name:default=}}? Read This First.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Simplify VDI & Storage Management. FREE VMTURBO WHITEPAPERS
Assuring Performance in VDI Deployments: <http://bit.ly/1m2kntp>
Aligning Virtualization and Storage Management: <http://bit.ly/1kRk0SJ>
46% of VDI projects are halted due to cost and performance issues. They don't have to be. The advantages of properly managed VDI and storage are undeniable: - Centralized management and maintenance - Lower operational costs - Increased security - Flexibility - Economies of scale across each of the above
VMTurbo’s Assuring Performance in VDI Deployments <http://bit.ly/1m2kntp> and Aligning Virtualization and Storage Management <http://bit.ly/1kRk0SJ> whitepapers address the inherent complexities of VDI and storage management, and how your organization can guarantee performance, efficiency, and positive end user experience just like Aetna Insurance <http://ubm.io/1gGvrKZ> recently did. Downloads White Papers Products 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
